Harry woke up with a groan. Due to his poor eyesight, he didn't register anything as wrong untill he realized that something was in his mouth. He tried to spit it out, but it refused to move from his lips. He was suddenly very awake and he tried to sit up only to find straps around his chest, stomach, and ankles kept him down.

His hand shot to his mouth. Not only were his hands covered in thick fingerless mittens, but his mouth was also filled with a pacifier. He thrashed and squirmed, knocking his arms against the bars of the crib he was in. In the midst of his struggles, he heard crinkling below his waist. He froze and reached down with his mittened hand and felt his crotch. Through the mitten, he could feel multiple layers of diapers and the crinkle of plastic pants.

Harry heard a door open. He watched as a blurry blond figure made its way toword the crib. The figure reached over the bars and placed his glasses on his face.

"Hello, Potter."

Malfoy!

"How shall we begin the day, my new baby boy?"

11121111.content:
“Perhaps you need a little help, baby?” Draco asked as he pointed his wand at Harry and cast a non-verbal spell. Harry immediately lost all control over his bladder. His eyes began to tear up at the humiliation.

“There, isn’t that better? To just letting it go instead of holding it all back?” Draco asked in a soothing voice.

Harry nodded unintentionally. Draco laid a hand on Harry’s cheek and used his thumb to dry the tears. Harry found even this to be very soothing and also comforting.
Draco then removed his hand and picked up Harry in his arms, he walked over to an adult sized changing table. That made Harry squeal in protest as he was sat down on the table. Draco simply put a pacifier in Harry’s mouth which effectively shut him.

“Now you can’t wear a wet diaper all day, can you? I promise you, Sweetie, you will feel better when I’ve changed it for you.” Draco whispered in Harry’s ear. Harry did want to get out of the wet diaper, but he was not sure how much he liked the idea someone else changing him, and would he let Draco Malfoy, of all people, do it?
But before he could find an answer, Draco put a hand on his chest and gently pushed him down on his back. Harry blushed when Draco removed the diaper, exposing him in the process. That blushing intensified as Draco began to clean his crotch with a baby wipe, applied baby powder on his skin, and finally putting Harry in a new, all clean diaper and helped the boy to sit up. Draco placed a kiss on both Harry’s cheeks.

“There, isn’t that better?” Harry didn’t answer. He didn’t want to admit that it did indeed feel good to have the soft material placed on his crotch. Or how nice it felt to have that baby powder put on his (usually) private parts by Draco’s gentle fingers. Or the relief of getting cleaned after wetting the first diaper. Harry could only compare it all to when you put on a newly washed pajamas after getting out of your sweaty clothes and had a nice warm shower.

Harry was thrown out of his thoughts when Draco lifted him up and walked over to an armchair. He placed Harry in his arms so his head was supported by his shoulder, basically how you held a baby.

“I like you, Harry. I know I haven’t shown it that good, but I do, I really do. And you’ve never had an easy life so far, I know, I’ve seen you. Please, could you let me take care of you now?” Draco had placed a bottle of warm milk on Harry’s bottom lip, Harry could accept it, or deny it.

But which he would choose would show of his choice on this matter, he understood. He could deny the bottle, and thereby saying ‘no’ to Draco’s request of taking care of and babying him. Or Harry could take the bottle, and agreeing to Draco’s offer, with all that it meant. Diaper changing, cribs, drinking warm milk from a bottle and over all being taken care of as a baby by Draco Malfoy.

Should he accept it?

1112111111.content:
“Daddy, I want a story.” Harry said, using a childish voice.

“Well then.” Draco smiled. “This story is called ‘Babbitty Rabbitty and her Cackling Stump’. Once upon a time…~

~and forever after, the statue of Babbitty remains on top of the stump, and no witch or wizard is ever hurt in that kingdom ever again.” Draco smiled as he looked down at Harry, who’s eyes had become really heavy and was about to shut. Draco rocked him a little while lulling quietly until Harry was fully asleep. Draco ran a hand over the front of Harry’s diaper, making the boy moan in his sleep.

Harry woke up a few hours later, back in the crib. At first he was a bit disoriented but then remembered the events earlier that day. Harry looked around quickly and found out that someone, Daddy Draco most likely, had carefully tucked him in with a warm and cozy blanket. Harry tried to think of the last time he had woken up after being tucked in. That had never happened at the Dursley’s and at the Weasley’s he and Ron had always gone to bed by themselves. His conclusion being that it hadn’t happened since his parents died, Harry decided that he liked being tucked in.
As he lied in his crib and sucked on his pacifier, after suddenly realizing he had a pacifier, Draco entered the room. He stopped trying to be quiet when he saw Harry awake.
“Good morning, baby boy! Had a nice nap?”
Harry nodded, then Draco removed the pacifier.
“Use your words, baby, always use your words when Daddy ask you a question.” Draco whispered with a stern voice. “Let’s try again. Did you have a nice nap?”
“Yes, Daddy, I had a nice nap.” Draco smiled and put back the pacifier in Harry’s mouth with a little plop. Harry gratefully started to suck on it. Draco then removed Harry’s blanket which made the boy shiver a bit when the cold air hit his skin. Draco felt the diaper, it was wet again. Draco smirked.
“The spell worked, I see.” Harry got confused.
“Wohat swell, Daddie?” Harry asked, the pacifier made it a bit difficult to speak properly.
“The spell I put on your bladder earlier prevents you from trying to hold your pee.” Draco explained as he picked up Harry in his arms and walked over to the changing table. This time Harry didn’t fight back, he laid down as soon as he was sat on the table, wanting Draco to remove the diaper as fast as possible. These things got a bit uncomfortable when he had wet them. Draco smiled at Harry’s cooperation and unstrapped the wet diaper. Harry moaned in relief when it was removed. After Draco had thrown it away he opened a drawer in the table and took out a pack of baby wipes. He grabbed Harry’s ankles and held his legs above them, giving Draco better access to Harry’s bottoms. Harry closed his eyes and enjoyed the touch as his lower region was being cleaned. He had made up his mind, it felt good to use diapers, not as good once he had wet them, but the process of changing them was more that worth it. Draco started powdering him once his bottoms was all clean. Seeing how much Harry ad seemed to like it when he had cleaned him, Draco used his finger to gently spread out the baby powder all over Harry’s crotch, purposely giving some extra attention to his genitals. Harry moaned loudly.
“Aww. Does my baby like that?” Draco cooed smirking.
“Yes, Daddy, me like it.” Harry panted in his baby voice. He had never been given a hand job before but this felt sooo good. Draco stopped and bent forward to plant a kiss on Harry’s stomach.
“Well, if you’re being a good baby for Daddy, you’ll get more of that.”
“And more stories too?” Harry couldn’t help but ask as he remembered the tale Draco had told him earlier about the animagus who had fooled the king and saved all witches and wizards in the kingdom. That fairytale was much better than the muggle fairytales aunt Petunia had told Dudley when they were younger.
Draco giggled in amusement as he put a new diaper under Harry’s bottom, folded it over his crotch and taped it close. He helped Harry sit up and peaked his nose.
“Yes, my baby. I’ll tell you more stories too.”
Draco put Harry in a cozy green onesie and carried him out of the room he turned into Harry’s nursery and went to the dining hall. Sucking on his pacifier Harry looked around a little surprised. He had just assumed that they had been in the room of requirement, but apparently not. This must be the Malfoy Manor. Harry whimpered and clung to Draco, hiding his face in the blonde’s neck. Draco stopped.
“You don’t need to be scared, Baby. My father have been sent to Azkaban and my mother…” Draco smiled a little. “Well, my mother already know about my fetish, and which gender I prefer. She’s much more open minded since the war ended. No one will hurt or judge you. I promise.” Harry relaxed a bit. Draco put him in a high chair and fed him some pasta carbonara after shaving it for him.
“So, you liked the story about Babbitty?” Draco asked as he fed Harry a spoonful of pasta. Harry took his time to swallow before answering.
“Yes, Daddy, me liked it very much!” Harry said still using his baby voice. “There’s an error in it, though.”
“Oh, really?” Draco replied. “And What might that be?”
“When Babbitty hid under the stump and spoke to the king, she must have still been a rabbit, but animaguses can’t talk while they’re animals.”
Draco smiled. “Yes, perhaps Beedle didn’t know that much about animaguses, or he changed that detail for the sake of the story. Anyway, that is a smart observation of you.” Draco poked Harry’s nose, making the boy giggle.

Then Draco became serious.
“Harry, I have to ask you if you want me to owl your friends. They will probably get worried otherwise. Do you want them to know you’re here?”
Harry thought for a moment.
“Daddy, I…”

11122.content:
11 year old Harry Potter blearily opened his eyes. He couldn't see much, signaling he didn't have his glasses on. His clothes felt strange, he looked down and despite how blurry everything was; he could tell he was wearing, what seemed like, a baby's onesie! Nervously he looked around and saw blurry whitish bars surrounding him, show that he was in an oversized cot(crib)!

He shifted from his spot and heard the loud sound of plastic pants, the type that'd go over nappies! Nervously he felt around, to his growing horror, he noticed he had thick padding around his crotch. That wasn't the worst part though. It seemed that it had been used as well!

"Good morning, baby boy. Did you have a nice rest?" A voice cooed mockingly. Harry frowned, he knew that voice. "Get me out of here, Malfoy!" He exclaimed, not knowing that it was Malfoy who put him there in the first place.

Draco (Malfoy) simply smirked, though Harry couldn't tell. He took his wand out and muttered a quick spell. It was a pretty common spell, generally used on people who lost their glasses or something like that. Harry thenblinked then opened his eyes, suddenly able to see clearly. "Malfoy, hurry up and get me out!" He insisted, standing up in the cot.

"What's wrong Potter, had an accident in your nappy?" Malfoy mocked. Harry looked down with a blush, unintentionally answering Draco's question. "I'll tell you what, Potter. Promise to be a good boy whilst I baby you, and I promise you won't regret it." He offered with a cocky smile. Harry weighed his options. He could swallow his pride and let Malfoy treat him like a baby without a fuss. It'd ceartinly be easier. On the other hand, was he really going to let that jerk treat him like this?

What'd he decide to do?

For Harry it was just another day at Hogwarts. He was hurrying down to the dungeons for potions (his least favourite lesson) for no other reason than to enjoy Professor Snape's callous company. His robes flapped about his ankles as he hurried down the final corridor. If he didn't hurry he was going to be late. And the last thing Snape needed was an excuse to be pissed at Harry.

"Not so fast!" He heard echo down the corridor. Harry jumped. As far as he had known, he was alone. Apparently not...

He whirled around to see who had shouted his way, but only caught a glimpse of a female figure behind a white, flash of light.

"Regresso Infantalis!"

Harry's vision blurred as he fell this knees and passed out in the potions hallway. Everything went black...

*

When Harry awoke he was back in bed. He felt the comforting cushion of his mattress beneath him. That whole situation had just been a bad dream. Now he could start his day afresh with no worries.
"Good morning, little one."

Harry jumped as he heard the female voice. He opened his eyes and realised things were not quite as they seemed. He was in bed, that much was true. But it wasn't his bed. He was lying on a blanket splayed over a thick plastic mattress. Around the bed were tall plastics bars that reached far up over his height. He sat up in disbelief.

"Oh my God..." He cried. "I've been shrunk!"

The female figure loomed over him, casting a long black shadow across the crib. Her hair dangled down over Harry.

The question is, what colour is her hair?

12211.content:
Enraged by what just happened to his godfather, Harry Potter chased after Bellatrix Lestrange with the hardest intention of doing the same thing to her. He was so blinded by fury that he ran after her without any backup and without any regard for his own safety.

He managed to catch up with her in the lobby of the Ministry of Magic. She continued laughing sadistically and taunting the teenager all the while. Harry fired a stunning spell after her, but missed the witch by several inches.

Bellatrix took that as a sign to head for cover. She quickly ducked behind the fountain and turned towards Harry. The young wizard knelt down by the fountain on the other side.

He peeked over the ledge and mumbled through gritted teeth “This is the end of the line.”
She chuckled maniacally and retorted “For you, maybe. You really think you can take me on by yourself?”

“Oh, I don’t THINK,” Harry yelled angrily, “I KNOW I will. I’m putting you in the ground if it’s the last thing I do!”

“You sound determined,” Bellatrix muttered cheekily, “Let’s see if you have the ability to carry out that threat.”

“Gladly,” Harry spat heatedly. He rose to his full height, pointed his wand at Bellatrix, and shouted “Crucio!”

Immediately, the witch dropped her wand and collapsed onto the ground. She started shrieking in agony and writing erratically.

Harry smiled in pleasure and gradually walked around the fountain towards Bellatrix. All the while, he kept his wand pointed directly at her. Overtime, she appeared to be in greater and more intense pain.

Before long, Harry was standing directly over Bellatrix, and he kept the Torture Curse on her. He reveled in her misery; it brought him inexplicable delight and satisfaction.

“What’s wrong, Bella?” he commented scathingly, “Am I hurting you? Oh, I’m so sorry. Let me help you ease the pain.”

After he said that, he kicked Bellatrix in the side. She was already in so much pain that the blow from Harry’s foot only added marginally to her pain.

He chuckled in amusement and pronounced “I’m going to make you feel the kind of pain you’ve made so many others feel. Including Sirius. And me.”

If Harry had his way, he would have continued torturing Bellatrix until he killed her. However, he had gotten close enough to her that there was barely any space between the two of them. Also, he was focused entirely on Bellatrix’s upper body, meaning he had left his guard down on everything else, including her lower body.

Amidst her bout of anguish, Bellatrix managed to realize this. So while Harry’s attention was diverted, she swung her legs under his, causing him to trip and stumble onto the ground.

Before Harry had a chance to recover from his fall, Bellatrix moved in. She raised her hand and struck the young wizard hard on the forehead. He fell backwards and hit his head against the fountain. As a result, he was knocked unconscious.

Bellatrix needed a moment to compose herself. Once she felt the effects of the torture curse wear off, she picked up her wand, rose to her full height, and gazed down at the boy with glasses.
She smirked in satisfaction and remarked “Well, the tables have turned unexpectedly. The Dark Lord will be pleased.”

122112.content:
Harry was out of commission for quite a while. Eventually, he managed to regain consciousness.
He felt a tinge of pain in his forehead, and he felt a little cold all over.

Once he was fully awake, Harry slowly opened his eyes. Everything around him was blurred. This was primarily because he was not wearing his glasses. However, even if he was, he doubted they would have made much difference. He was currently in a very dark room. There was no light to be seen anywhere.

He looked to his left and to his right, and he was unable to make out anything about his surroundings. He could not help but wonder where he was.

He noticed he was lying on a flat surface. It felt like a counter, a table, or another hard surface. All he did known was that it was too hard to be the floor or ground.

He figured he may as well get up. However, when he tried to sit up, he found he was stuck. His arms and legs felt stiff and rigid. He could not move them at all. Also, every time he moved even the slightest amount, he heard a faint crinkling sound, like plastic rustling. It seemed to originate from somewhere below his chest.

The only part of his body that Harry was able to move was his head. He managed to lift it up enough to gaze downwards at his body. Despite the darkness and his defective vision, he was able to see his entire body. His arms and legs had been strapped down onto the hard surface. He was fully restrained and unable to budge his limbs at all. They were so tight that he did not have room to wiggle free at all.

As unsettling as that was, it was not the most startling thing Harry noticed. That honor went to why he felt cold and the source of that crinkling sound. He was no longer wearing his school uniform. He had been stripped completely naked of his clothes. Even his shoes and socks were gone. However, that is not to say he was entirely naked now. He was wearing one article of clothing.

Around Harry’s waist was a large white disposable diaper. It was very thick and very bulky. It had been taped onto him perfectly; almost as though it had been made specifically for him.

Harry’s eyes widened in shock and he yelled “What the hell?”

At least, that was what he tried to yell. It came out as “Whbbb dhe hlllb?”

That was when Harry realized that he had been gagged, as well. A long scarf had been placed over his mouth and tied at the back of his head. He tried shaking it off, but it had been knotted very tightly. He mumbled angrily, but the gag was very effective. All he could get out was some gibberish.
Harry struggled to break free of his bonds, but he was tied up very tightly. Ultimately, he just sighed and mumbled in defeat.

He wondered; how could he have possibly gotten into this situation. The last thing he remembered was confronting Bellatrix Lestrange at the Ministry of Magic. He could have sworn he had her at his mercy, but he vaguely recalled taking a blow to the head.

Before he could speculate on what happened after that, he heard soft footsteps. They sounded as though they were approaching him from the right. Harry turned his head in that direction. By squinting his eyes and carefully focusing, he managed to spot the far wall. There was a single door on it, and a figure seemed to be nearing it.

Soon, the door was opened up completely, causing a bit of light to slip in. Harry continued squinting, and he realized that the person standing in the doorway was…
122112.title: Harry's POV; skip to when he wakes up.

1221121.content:
At first, Harry was only able to determine that the person in the doorway was tall, female, and dressed in black. After concentrating a little more closely, he realized she was the last person he had seen before he lost consciousness. It was Bellatrix Lestrange herself.

When Harry discovered this, he felt his earlier anger resurface. He vigorously shook himself in effort to break free of his bonds, and he tried shouting death threats and other hostile remarks. However, his restraints prevented him from getting up by even a marginal amount, and his gag only allowed inarticulate mumbles to get out.

The loudest sound he made was produced by his sole article of clothing. Every move Harry made caused his thick diaper to resonate a loud crinkle.

Bellatrix just smiled and commented “Oh good. The baby’s awake.”

She slowly entered the room and began approaching Harry. The closer she got, the harder Harry tried to break free of his bonds. But they were very effective; he could not free himself.

Within a minute, Bellatrix had reached Harry. She was standing right over him. He glared up at her, looking as though he would kill her if she got any closer. He knew he could have appeared very threatening at this time, what with him being tied down, gagged, and diapered. That did not cloud the hate and malevolence he felt for this woman.

Naturally, Bellatrix was not the least bit intimidated by Harry’s gestures. She smirked and teased him with “You look so cute right now, you know. I’m glad I decided to do this.”

Harry was still infuriated, but he had room to feel perplexed, as well. When Bellatrix saw the look of bewilderment on his face, she decided to explain the situation. She enlightened him with:

“I managed to knock you out mere moments before you could torture me to death. At the time, it was tempting to finish you off myself. But the Dark Lord gave us explicit orders to capture you alive. And unharmed, if possible. Aside from the bump I gave you and a few bruises, you had no blemishes. At any rate, the Dark Lord told us he would arrive at the Ministry shortly after we did. I thought about waiting around for him, but by staying there, I ran the risk of encountering your friends first. So I chose to bring you here instead.”

She paused for a moment, and then she continued with “Naturally, I couldn’t afford to leave you unrestrained, hence the bonds and the gag. I’m sure you’re wondering about your current apparel, as well. Well, I also decided to free you of that lousy school uniform of yours, too, and get you into something more comfortable and appropriate. So I stripped you and put you in nappies.”

A look of disgust came across Harry’s face. Bellatrix scoffed and leaned against the table. She remarked “I never would have imagined you’d be so adorable in them, though. Then again, I never thought I’d find you adorable in ANY way. Guess anybody can be adorable under certain circumstances. Even you.”

She then placed her right hand on the front of Harry’s diaper. The teenager tried to shake her hand off, but his feeble struggles barely made any difference. Bellatrix softly rubbed the front of Harry’s diaper, as if she was checking for wetness. Strangely, this action had a minor pleasing effect on Harry. A moment later, Bellatrix relented and observed “Looks like you managed to stay dry. I’m glad for that, even though I wasn’t expecting you to use these. So soon, that is.”

Harry had no idea what that last statement was supposed to imply. Just then, he heard another pair of footsteps approaching the room. He and Bellatrix both turned back towards the entrance, and a moment later, another person appeared into the doorframe. It was…
1221121.title: Bellatrix

choices: Voldemort departs, leaving Bellatrix alone with Harry
12211211.content:
Since it was still very dark and Harry was not wearing his glasses, he could not see who the person was at first glance. He got a glimpse of Bellatrix's face, and she seemed to be smiling at that person, though her smile appeared to be a little uneasy.

Harry returned his gaze to the doorway, and the new figure began to enter the room. This one was cloaked in black, as well. The face was little more than a blur to him. However, he quickly realized that the figure was bald. He did not know that many bald people, and he knew even fewer bald people who were affiliated with Bellatrix Lestrange.

When the figure was halfway between the door and the table, Harry could begin to make out the person's face. He quickly discovered that the figure had narrow eyes and slits for nostrils. Immediately the diapered boy realized who was standing before him. It was the very person who had made him famous, as well as the very person responsible for all the grief in his life.

Lord Voldemort stopped right in front of the table. He stood next to his subordinate and gazed down at the bound boy. He grinned in both amusement and satisfaction. Then he turned to the woman and stated "Very good work subduing him, Bella."

Bellatrix lightly nodded her head in acknowledgement.

Voldemort looked back down at Harry and stared into his eyes. That stare could have frightened anyone else, but Harry had already faced the sinister wizard several times and lived to tell it. He refused to be afraid or to even appear to be afraid. Even if this was to be his last day alive.

Regardless, Voldemort shifted his attention to Harry's lower body. He reached out his hand and pressed it against the boy's diapered crotch. Even though Voldemort's hand did not come in direct contact with Harry's skin, Harry was overcome with discomfort anyway. One could hardly blame him; all that stood between Voldemort's hand and his privates was a thick lair of white padding. He tried to shake away the older wizard's hand, but he was tied up too tightly.

Ultimately, Voldemort removed his hand from Harry's padding and thought aloud "This is rather ironic, Harry. When you and I first met, you were in nappies at the time, too. And you were just as helpless then as you are now. The only real difference was that you were considerably younger back then. And, of course, there is no one here to sacrifice themselves for you. So now I could kill you without my own spell backfiring on me this time."

Harry mumbled through his gag, trying to claim that he did not fear death. If he was to die right then, he was not going to give the Dark Lord the satisfaction of seeing him beg for his life.

"However..." Voldemort muttered tentatively. He looked around at the bound and diapered boy, and then he announced "I'm not going to kill you. Now that I see you, I find that I like you better in this position. Now you know what it feels like to be disgraced, powerless, humiliated, stripped of all your greatness. That is just how I felt when you defeated me fourteen years ago."

Inwardly, Harry was a little relieved that he was not going to die. At least not yet. Regardless, he could imagine that what Voldemort had planned for him would not be much better than death.

"I'm going to keep you like this," Voldemort revealed, "Tied to a table and wearing nappies like a helpless baby. You'll be treated like a baby, as well. Bellatrix will be 'taking care' of you."

Bellatrix leaned on the end of the table and grinned wickedly. She remarked "It'll be just you and me, 'sweetie.' Imagine what 'fun' we'll have."

It was a good thing Bellatrix had tied down Harry's legs, otherwise he would have kicked her squarely in the face right then. Alas, the most he could do was shake his body and mumble through his gag.

Voldemort scoffed at Harry's futile struggles and disclosed "Bella has always wanted a child, but her husband has never been especially 'cooperative' in that pursuit. But he's landed himself back in Azkaban, and you're in a nappy. So this works out for us all. Oh, and you can forget about getting rescued. This house is located in a place no one will ever think to look. Dumbledore, the Order, and your precious little friends will not find you anytime soon."

He paused for a minute, and then he continued with "Needless to say, we'll be holding you in secret. But only for a while. Once I've taken over the Ministry of Magic, I'll finally present you to the public. Odds are almost everyone in the wizard community will submit to me straightaway. The few who don't will be discouraged from resisting when they see what their greatest 'hero' has been reduced to."

Harry would have given almost anything for his wand just then. If he had it, he could break free, finish off Voldemort and his sadistic servant for good, escape, and never speak of this again. Alas, he could do nothing but listen on hopelessly.

As embarrassing as this whole situation was, Harry was suddenly struck with the overwhelming urge to fall asleep. 'It must have been something in that damn milk.' he thought. He groaned angrily. Felling his eyelids droop, he fell back onto the thin mattress of the playpen, falling asleep in seconds.
Several hours later, Harry awoke to find the room dark. He looked out the nearest window, and saw how dark it really was. He looked around again, his eyes adjusting to the lack of light. Soon enough, he could see. It was then that he realized that he was't in the sitting room, but once again in that damn nursery. He sighed. He finally noticed that he still had the pacifier in his mouth. Fed up with this, he spat the object out, and sat up. He stood, and climbed out of the crib. As soon as he did, we walked to the door. Reaching for the doorknob, he tuned it, opening the door. He froze when he saw Bellatrix standing there. "And what is the little baby doing out of bed so late, hmm?" she asked patronizingly. Harry stood there, silent. He knew he should not be scared of this woman, he should not! But he was. He was so scared, he felt like crying. And that's exactly what he did. Harry began sobbing, wishing he had just stayed in the damn crib. Bellatrix picked him up, and carried him back to the crib. She put a new pacifier in his mouth. She cast a quick charm on it so that it could only be removed by her. Harry calmed down once he was laying down, and fell back asleep. Bellatrix stayed there for a few minutes, leaving once she was sure Harry was asleep.

1321.content:
Ron Weasley had finally enough of the high and mighty Harry Potter claiming all the attention for himself. It seems that his current fame and fortune were still not enough for the precious boy who lived, so Harry had somehow cheated himself into the Triwizard Tournament and became the Forth Champion to stand out even more. What a selfish move.

After suppressing his jealousy for so long, Ron eventually broke and decided to take Harry down from that high horse as quick and effective as possible. So with some help from his big brothers Fred and George, who he fooled into thinking he would prank Malfoy, Ron managed to spike Harrys breakfast with powerful laxatives. Let’s see how proudly the boy who lived would swagger through the halls after he messed himself in front of his classmates.

Coincidentally it was midway through their next Transfiguration class as the laxatives kicked in and screwed the Potter heir up from the inside.

After a brief struggle, Harry quickly realized that there was no chance he would be able to fight it off until the end of class. Swallowing his pride, he slowly raised his trembling hand. “Pro-Professor McGonagall… Excuse me, but I really need to go to the toilet right now…”

The stern Head of the House Gryffindor looked at him in utter disbelief. “Are you kidding me, Mr. Potter? We are in the middle of an important magical theory. I might allow to go as soon as we start practicing the spell, but for now grit your teeth together and hold it, understood?”

“B-But Professor! It is really urgent, can I please… ugh…”

Ron could barely suppress his laughter as the boy who lived suddenly jumped up and started to perform what could best be described as a potty dance. Hermione stared at Harry as if she saw him for the very first time. The rest of the class was split between utter shock and amusement.

“Mr. Potter, control yourself!” Professor McGonagall ordered frantically. “You are a proud lion of Gryffindor, not to mention Hogwarts Champion. Stop behaving like a little baby.”

But it was already too late. Only a short moment later the laxatives succeeded in overwhelming Harry´s resistance and he started to pee and poop himself right in the middle of the class.
1321.title: Fourth Year

13211.content:
Harry wished he could just sink into ground and disappear forever. It appeared that even his own classmates were too stunned by the fact that this event really happened to laugh at him straight of the bet.

The boy who lived was so ashamed that he didn’t even realize Professor McGonagall moving towards him until she roughly grabbed him at the arm and pulled him in front of the class. “Never in my whole carrier at Hogwarts…” she frantically muttered under her breath. “I cannot believe this… And right after he was named Hogwarts Champion… What a disgrace…”

Slowly regaining her composure Professor McGonagall addressed the class in a sharp voice, ripping most of the students out of their current shock and awe. “I hope we can all agree that the displayed behavior is completely unworthy of a Hogwarts Champion. For the utter disgrace Mr. Potter just brought upon our school, I call upon my position as Deputy Headmistress to ensure he receives an appropriate and immediate punishment. Hogwarts doesn’t have any room for naughty babies who are still messing their own pants.”

She seemed to silently debate for a moment what punishment would be fitting before a sinister smile spread over her thin lips. “Well, drastic situations are calling for drastic measures. Let this be a warning for every single one of you to always keep your bladder under control.”

With that Professor McGonagall swung her wand and started to transfigure the various items on her desk into the necessary equipment. One after the other she created a set of diapers in Harry´s size, cream and baby powder, mittens and booties, some baby clothes, a matching bonnet as well as a pacifier. Last but not least she tipped onto the desk itself which promptly turned into a giant changing table. The whole class was stunned by her casual display of magic and continued to watch curiously.

“Now strip yourself and get onto the table, Mr. Potter. I don’t have the whole day to take care of immature students like you.”

In that moment Harry was scared beyond his wildest dreams. Was his Head of House seriously trying to put him into diapers in front of the entire class? This could not be happening, there was simply no way. “B-But Professor… This is crazy, you c-can´t do that. Please, just give me detention for a few weeks, we both know this will never happen again…”

“At least we agree on one point Mr. Potter” Professor McGonagall replied emotionless. “This will indeed never happen again. I will make sure of that personally.” One wave of her wand later most of Harry´s clothes were vanished into thin air, leaving the poor Hogwarts Champion in nothing but his soaked underwear. “Do you really want this to go the hard way? Get onto the table now!”

Harry had been living with the Dursley family for 4 years after his parents passing. He asked about his parents, they told him car crash, you know the routine. Harry was still undergoing potty training. So pull-ups were a must, though he had to learn how to change himself, since the Dursley's wouldn't do it, now that he seemed compitent enough. But he had little to no training on how to use the potty.

It was during this time period that the family was in London, spoiling Dudley, as usual, and caring little of what Harry was doing, as long as he didn't make a scene. Wondering off, since the Dursleys seemed to care less, harry accidentally had bumped into a stout Giger haired woman. When she saw him, it wasn't one of anger or disgust. In fact, she seemed to have a very caring look about her. Rose cheeks, a motherly smile, and clothes seen on most middle-class families in Great Britain. "Oh, beg your pardon little dear," She stated, as she helped Harry back to his feet.

"Sorry Ma'am," Harry responded, scared she may start scolding him.

"Oh, not to worry my dear, you've done nothing wrong. Now what's an adorable little boy like you doing here, by yourself. Where are your parents dear?" Molly asked.

"Um. They not with me anymores," Harry responded.

He didn't know it, but Molly already knew who he was. She just had to be sure she hadn't mistaken the scar on his forehead for something regular, and his admission just confirmed it. "Well, who looks after you dear?" Molly asked. She wanted to know where the Dursley's were, knowing they were "supposed" to be his caretakers.

He pointed to them, off a distance, with his cousin, before he said, "My Uncle Vewnon and Auntie Petunia, but dey don't weally care abouts me. Dey always pay attention to Dudley over der."

Molly couldn't believe her ears. Harry was being mistreated severely by the very family who was supposed to take care of him. It was no wonder he seemed so timid, but she was thankful he was opening up to her. Then she pondered. Sure, she had her own children to care for, but they would be over the moon if they were to become Harry Potter's siblings. Adopted of course, but still siblings. And the Weasleys had been close with the Potters before his parents were killed. So, if she made her plea to the Ministry's council, Molly could become his new mother. "Well, it may take a little time dear, but, would you like to come and live with me and my family?" Molly asked.

Harry looked at Molly. "W-Weally?" he asked.

His eyes were full of hope. He was so excited, he hadn't realized he had hugged her. "Of course dear, just let me talk to your Uncle and Aunt, and then to some others, and we'll get things settled," Molly said.

There was everything here, from Diapers and pull-ups, to a child decorated television with movies for kids his age group, to a crib his size, or a bed should he want to lay there, or have one of the parents sleep with him, if he felt scared, to toys, both for what was considered to be for tots younger then him, and toys for his age group. And the floor, walls and furniture had been pushed up, so avoid causing him any injury, a luxury the Dursleys never provided. With magic, it was not trouble getting this together. And when other witches and wizards who knew Harry's parents, or at least of what had happened to him originally, donations came flooding in generously, even those who were across the Great Atlantic Ocean in the U.S. The Weaslys had gone from a Poor family to perhaps one of the richest families in the Wizarding World, Granted, some of the Wizards who considered themselves "purebloods" and "Nobles" did not contribute, due to their stuck up nature, but this bothered the Weasly's little, and they did not spend the money on meaningless things they all wanted that they'd probably toss out in a couple years time. They used it to repair the house, and now, it looked almost like a castle that would make the Royal Family of the Muggles Buckingham Palace envious. And the Weaslys agreed that much of this money would be used to keep all the children well looked after, and that meant Harry could get spoiled here.

And Harry's and Ron's and Ginny's rooms had been made bigger, thanks to all the money, so these nurserys could do well for sleep overs. After Harry was able to take in the surroundings of his new room, he asked, "Um..... Mommy, what are the rules of me being your son?"

Molly smiled, "Well Harry dear. Your just an adorable little tot, and I know that while the Muggles may have tried to hurry you into growing up, here, you don't have to try and act so grown up. I know I was trying to get my little Ron to get potty trained, but, I was being a little to speedy with that. If you wish to wear training pants or a diaper dear, just let me know, and I'll change you into one. And let me know if you need a change once you go. And if you're hungry, just let me know, and you can choose between drinking my mommy milk, like Ron and Ginny do, or you can have whatever we cook for meals dear, it's up to you, and your siblings won't give you grief for it. Do be aware though, when I say it's time for a nap or for bed, you do as mommy says. Oh, and if you want to play with Ron or sleep with him in his room, that's perfectly fine, since we let Ginny sleep with her big brother sometimes. They both may come to sleep with you in your room too."

This made Harry giggle a bit, knowing he wasn't the youngest in the family, but he also didn't have to act like a big grown up so quickly. He was also amazed Molly was willing to breastfeed him. Petunia spoiled Dudley with breastfeeding, but not him. He was given a bottle or real food, but now he had the choice of mothers milk. And he could choose what kind of padding he would want to wear, and his siblings wouldn't mind in the slightest, or tease him about it. He was then told what he could wear in public, but had the choice of going pantless at home, as Ron and Ginny often did, and he was given a run down of how things happened around the house, and when they went into town. It was all a lot more lenient then before the Weaslys adopted him. He was now Harry Potter Weasely.

After Harry asked for a diaper this time round, wanting the extra protection, now that he had the choice......
1422153151.title: In the Wizarding World, they don't grow up fast.

choices: 5 years old. About to go to Kindergarten. Could be Magic Kindergarten now.
6 years old. His magic is really starting to get him into situations.
7 years old. The teachers have called him odd for some time now.
14221532.content:
Okay, so, it's been a little bit since Harry has lived with the Dursleys. Already at a stage where they can use him as the family slave, like seen in the movie. And it's around this age group he bumps into Molly Weasly. She'll be taking him home with her, through the legal way, of course, and give him a better childhood.

But what age within this age group is he?
14221532.title: Between 5-7 years old

choices: Decided she would regress him in secret.
Asked the council of magic to let her regress him for a better childhood.
Asked the council if she could make him a Weasly by blood. (Pregnancy involved.)
14221535.content:
About a year before Harry Potter was suppose to be coming to Hogwarts, before anyone knew the Boy Who Lived was reaching that point to attend, Molly Weasly had bumped into him. She had detected the boy's magical aura, and seen a few magical things happen around him, he himself wasn't able to really explain. And when she saw how his "caretakers" were treating him, she went to the Ministry, and Dumbledore was in attendance. After a good long discussion, the council of magic agreed that it was better to have him live with the Weasly family. When they got to the Dursley's residence, they did not hesitate in surrendering the boy to the wizards. One, cause they had wanted a way to be rid of him, and two, they knew they were no match should they resist the Wizards.

Harry was really confused and scared, but with how kind and gentle Molly was treating him, he trusted her. She could see that his upbringing was not a very happy one. At that moment, Molly Weasly...........
14221535.title: 10 years old

choices: She goes to talk to him
She lets him be for now
14223.content:
Harry Potter could not believe Lord Voldemort was finally gone. The war of the wizarding world was over at long last.

After years of eluding the Dark Lord at every turn, after facing numerous challenges and problems that had been thrown his way, after spending several months on the run in the search for the Horcruxes, after facing Voldemort off at Hogwarts and finishing him personally, peace had finally been attained.

But it had not been acquired with cost. So many good people had perished in the war against Voldemort. Albus Dumbledore... Sirius Black... Alastor Moody... Remus Lupin... Nymphadora Tonks... Colin Creevy... even Fred Weasley had fallen victim to that tyrant's cruelty. Harry could not help but feel as though he had been responsible for all those deaths, and that they all could have been avoided if he had been more careful.

However, none of his friends blamed him for any of those deaths. Especially not the Weasleys; they would never turn against him, and they would never accuse him of being responsible for Fred's death. To prove this, the Weasleys had offered for Harry to stay with them after the Battle of Hogwarts.

Although Sirius' old estate in London now belonged to Harry, he did not want to go there just yet. Instead, he wanted to spend some time living with people close to him. So he accepted the Weasleys' offer and moved in temporarily. He assured them that he would not stay too long, as he did not want to become a burden. They asserted that they could never regard him as anything of the sort. Even so, to express his gratitude, he decided to aid the Weasleys with their financial difficulties by letting them access his bank account in Gringotts. They had been hesitant to accept, but Harry insisted, claiming it was the least he could do.

It had already been a couple weeks after the death of Voldemort. Harry had been living at Godric's Hollow for that entire time. Fred had been buried a week beforehand, and the family was still in mourning.

Currently, Arthur and his sons Bill, Charlie, and Ron were at Diagon Alley. They were helping George expand the twins' joke shop as a way to honor Fred's memory. Percy was busy working for the Minister of Magic Kingsley Shacklebolt, and Ginny was spending the week with Hermione and Luna.

So at present, Molly Weasley was the only one there. She enjoyed spending some one-on-one time with Harry. In the six years she had known him, she had come to think of him as one of her own children. He had grown attached to her family, as well. They were the closest thing he had to a real family.

One morning, Molly looked outside and noticed Harry was at the garden, chasing away the gnomes. That was one of the things he did to be helpful around the house. Molly appreciated that.

She noticed that while Harry was able to successfully clear the gnomes away, he seemed distracted. It was as though he was depressed or saddened by something.
14223.title: After

choices: She offers to care for him
142231.content:
Concerned, Molly went outside and walked over to the boy with the lightning bolt scar. When he saw her approach, he smiled and greeted her with "Hello, Mrs. Weasley."

"Good morning, Harry," she returned happily, "The gnomes giving you trouble?"

"A bit, but I can handle it," Harry replied.

"Good," Molly stated. After a short pause, she added in "Can I talk with you?"

"Of course," he asserted, "I was about to take a break anyway."

Harry put down his tools and turned to Mrs. Weasley. He asked "What would you like to talk about?"

"Well..." she began tentatively, "I'd like to know... how are you feeling?"

"What do you mean?" he queried in confusion.

"Sorry if I sound as though I'm prying, but you seem distraught," Molly disclosed.

Harry thought about that statement, and then he sighed and professed "Truthfully... I am."

Molly stepped close to the boy in glasses, placed her hand on his shoulder, and remarked "Could you tell me why? Does it have to do with... recent events?"

"Somewhat," Harry revealed, "You know that legend that helped us defeat Voldemort?"

Molly winced at the name, but nodded her head.

Harry continued with "Well, one of the three relics mentioned was known as a 'Resurrection Stone.' Its purpose was to bring people back from the dead. While the legend did not exactly portray it as a pleasant object, I was holding out hope that if I managed to acquire it in real life, I... well, I..."

"What, sweetie?" she asked.

He sighed again and illuminated "I was hoping I could bring back everybody we've lost. Primarily my parents. I ultimately DID find the Stone, but it turns out all it can do is bring back the projection of someone's life force for a short time. It was incapable of bringing them back permanently. Although I was kind of expecting that to be the case... I can't help but feel depressed."

Molly frowned and hugged the teenaged boy. She whispered "I'm so sorry, honey. I... I had no idea."

He lightly hugged back and told her "It's alright, Mrs. Weasley. I'm used to being disappointed. It's just... I was really hoping that just once in my life, I could know what it's like to having a parent who loves and cares for me. Don't get me wrong; I'm grateful for everything you and your family have done for me. But still... I don't know what it's like to be cared for."

Molly almost felt as though she was going to cry. She could not imagine what growing up must have been for this fine boy. After everything he'd been through, he deserved to be loved and taken care of. She wished she could fulfill his desire.

Then she got an idea. Perhaps she could...
142231.title: She goes to talk to him

choices: Harry needs some time to think
1422311.content:
When Harry finally pulled away from Molly, the woman smiled, looked him in the eye, and proposed "I might have a solution to your problem, Harry."

"Really?" Harry remarked in interest, "What sort of solution?"

"Well, I'm a mother of seven, so I know all about parenthood," she explicated, "Plus, I think of you as one of my own children. So how about I treat you like one?"

Harry raised an eyebrow in bewilderment and muttered "I'm a little confused. I already was under the impression that you feel that way about me. I mean, I can't deny that you and your husband are the closest things I have to real parents. So what would be different?"

"Perhaps I was too vague," Molly commented, "What I meant was I'll treat you like a young child."

"How so?" Harry inquired.

"Well, isn't it obvious?" she uttered in amusement, "I'd like to treat you like a baby. I'll diaper you, change you, feed you, bathe you, everything."

Harry was surprised at that, and he was not entirely sure how to respond. "That's... a strange proposition. I mean, diapers? I'm seventeen years old. I'm practically old enough to have children of my own. Why would you want to give me that sort of... treatment?"

"Because I know this really bothers you," Molly observed, "Your childhood living with your Aunt and Uncle must have been a nightmare. You deserved much better than what they gave you. I want to give you a proper childhood; the one who were deprived of. And in order to do that, I have to start at the very beginning. That means babyhood. I'm sorry if I seem too straightforward or forceful, Harry. Believe me; all I want to do is help you. This is your decision and yours alone. If you refuse, I'll respect your choice and drop the subject. However, if you accept, I will do everything in my power to make you feel loved and cared for. So, what do you say?"
1422311.title: She offers to care for him

choices: Harry asks Molly to undress him
14223111.content:
Harry found this proposal to be a very strange one. He knew that Molly was very fond of him, but he had no idea she would ever want to go THIS far to make him feel like one of her own children. After all, being treated like a baby seemed a bit excessive.

However, Harry could tell that Molly only wanted to help him. She had been through a lot lately, too. Having lost one of her own children, he could only imagine how much pain she must have been in. Maybe if he agreed, he would be able to make her feel better, as well. He knew he could never replace Fred, but he would enable Molly to be a mother once more. Aside from that, maybe wearing diapers and acting like a baby for a while would actually be fun. It could also help him alleviate some stress and forget about his troubles. Plus, he and Molly would be alone for the next several days. So nobody would be around to see him being treated like a baby.

After a couple minutes of contemplating his options, Harry looked to the middle-aged woman, grinned awkwardly, and stated "Okay, I'll try out your suggestion. Who knows? I might actually come to like it."

Molly smiled proudly and giddily proclaimed "I sure hope you will. Trust me; you're not making the wrong decision, sweetie. Now, follow me, please."

Harry nodded and followed Molly back inside the house. He was still a little hesitant, but he had already agreed, so there was no going back.

Molly led Harry up to the attic. The furniture from the family's old nursery was up there. She used her wand to enlarge the crib, the changing table, and a few other items in the room.

After that, she turned to the boy with the lightning bolt scar and told him "Alright, Harry. Let's get started."

Harry nodded his head and approached the changing table. Before he could climb on, Molly stopped him and said "Hang on. We need to get you out of your clothes first. Would you like to undress yourself, or would you like me to do it?"
14223111.title: Harry accepts

142231112.content:
Harry just shrugged and murmured "Well, I suppose... you could do it. If you don't mind, that is."

Molly grinned again and asserted "I don't mind at all, sweetie."

She then helped Harry out of his clothes. She started by untying his shoes and pulling them off with his socks. After that, she unzipped his jacket and slipping it off his shoulders. She had him hold up his arms and then she took off his shirt. After that, she removed his pants and boxer shorts.

Harry was a little embarrassed about being fully naked in front of Molly, but she did not seem uncomfortable in the least. She assured Harry that everything was alright, and that he had nothing to feel embarrassed about.

Now all he had on was his glasses. With some assistance from Molly, Harry hopped onto the changing table and laid flat on his back. He looked up at her and stated "I guess this is it. I'm ready when you are.

"Very well," Molly avowed. She then reached underneath the table and pulled out a pair of fluffy, thick white cloth diapers and four safety pins. She also brought out a bottle of oil and powder.

Molly then proceeded to diaper Harry. She started by covering his private area with a thin layer of baby powder and rubbing it in. After that, she poured some oil on her hands and gently massaged it into his skin. Then she picked up the cloth diapers, lifted Harry up by his ankles, and slid them underneath his bottom. After setting him back down, she spread his legs and pulled the front of the diapers up between his legs. She then used her right hand to hold the front in place, and she brought up the left side of the diapers and pinned it in place with two of the pins. After that, she hold onto the front of the diapers with her left hand, and she brought up the right side and pinned it in place with the other two pins. She made sure to pull them tight and snug.

Harry blushed a deep red as his best friend's mother diapered him. After the diapers were secure on him, Molly helped Harry off the changing table and got him back on his feet. Harry gazed down at his diapers and used his hands and eyes to examine them. They fit him perfectly; they were neither too loose nor too tight, and they were surprisingly comfortable. They were very thick and bulky though; he could hardly put his legs together. He actually liked the feel of wearing them.

Once he was done looking over his new attire, he looked back up at Molly. Ironically, Harry was now a couple inches taller than the red-haired woman. He softy mumbled "Well, uh... thank you, Mrs. Weasley."

She smiled again and told him "You're welcome, sweetie. And please, just call me 'Molly.' Or 'Mommy,' if you prefer."

Harry was perplexed by that, but given the circumstances, he could get in to that.

Molly then took his hand in hers and pronounced "Now come with me. It's time for the Baby to have some fun."

Harry scoffed at being called 'Baby' and left the attic alongside Molly. He tried to walk, but he ended up waddling due to the thickness of the cloth diapers.

Soon they arrived back in the first floor. Molly kissed Harry's forehead, patted Harry's diapered bottom and asked him "So what would you like to do now, Harry?"
142231112.title: Harry asks Molly to undress him

choices: They eat in the dining room
They eat out on the porch
1422311121.content:
"Well... what do babies normally do?" Harry asked curiously

"Lots of things," Molly informed him, "A lot of the time, they play."

"Play with what?" he queried.

"Toys, of course," she responded.

"Oh," Harry commented, gazing at the wall, "I never had toys growing up. Dudley had enough for both of us, but the word 'share' wasn't exactly in his vocabulary."

"I'm sorry to hear that, sweetie," Molly said sincerely, hugging the boy and giving his diapered bottom a few pats, "Luckily, as a mother of seven, we have plenty of old toys around here. Would you like to see them?"

"Sure," Harry told her gladly, smiling.

Molly then left the room and returned with two crates' worth of old baby toys. They looked like ordinary playthings, only with a hint ofmagic to them.

"Is there anything else you need, dear?" Molly asked the boy.

"No, I think I've got everything I need, Mrs. Wea- er... 'Mommy,'" Harry revealed.

Molly grinned again and kissed Harry on the forehead again. Then she pronounced "I'll go ahead and make some lunch for us. You just relax and have some fun."

Harry nodded his head and watched as the red-haired woman went to the kitchen. Once he was alone, he turned to the toys and began playing with them. There were fake wands, building blocks that could stack themselves, coloring books that changed hue or made themselves blank again, wizard dolls that moved and talked, and a multitude of other interesting objects.

Harry got in some time with all of the objects. As he played, his attention kept shifting to the thick padding between his legs. It was amazingly comfortable and soothing, and it smelled very sweet. In an odd way, the diapers felt very reassuring to him. He was happy to wear them.

At first, he was a little self-conscious that the diapers were the ONLY things he was wearing apart from his glasses, but since Mrs. Weasley was the only other person there and she had been the one who diapered him, he could put up with that. In fact, he found that he liked having no clothing on other than his diapers. It made him feel less constricted.

As Harry had fun with his toys, he could hear the sounds of cooking in the next room, and he could smell food being prepared.

About forty-five minutes later, Molly came back into the room and pronounced "Lunch is almost ready, sweetie. Where would you like to sit while we eat; in the dining room, or out on the porch?"
1422311121.title: Play

14223111212.content:
Harry was still wearing nothing but his cloth diapers. So if anyone came by while he and Molly were outside, it would produce an extremely awkward situation.

Despite this, Harry had been outside when Molly first gave him the idea to be her baby. He knew it was a very lovely day. The weather and climate were too pleasing to spend the time indoors. Plus, people rarely ever visited the Weasleys without prior notice. So the odds of them having company that day were very slim. In addition to that, Harry had developed a bit of a fondness for daring activities. Going outside in just a diaper would certainly be a thrill.

After some consideration, he declared to Molly "Let's eat outside."

She smiled and responded with "Alright, dear. Just a moment."

Molly left the room and returned a few minutes later with a highchair that was large enough to fit Harry. She gestured for the diapered boy to follow her outside, and he waddled after her. As stepped out through the door, Harry felt the cool summer air on his bare skin.

Molly placed the highchair on the center of the porch and told him "Get on."

Harry obediently went over to the highchair and climbed onto it. At one point, his thickly padded bottom was sticking out conspicuously; Molly took advantage of that and gave him a few gentle pats on the back of his diaper. He felt them, but just barely; he was diapered very thickly.

Once Harry was comfortably seated in the highchair, Molly closed and locked the tray. The fit was a little tight, but Harry could put up with that.

Molly left again and came back outside with two plates of food. She set one of them down on the tray to Harry's highchair and she put the other one on an adjoining table. After that, she looked to the diapered teen and asked "Would you like me to feed you, honey? Or would you rather feed yourself?"
14223111212.title: They eat out on the porch

142231112121.content:
"Could you please feed me... Mummy?" Harry asked politely

Molly smiled and said "Of course, honey."

Molly then got out a bib and tied it around Harry's neck. stood next to the high chair and proceeded to cut up Harry's food. Once she was done, she picked up a forkful, held it up to his head, and cooed "Open up."

Harry giggled and opened his mouth, allowing Molly to feed him the first bit of lunch.

Over the next few minutes, Molly alternated between eating from her own plate and feeding Harry from his. Before too long, both plates were empty, and Harry was full.

"Would you care for a drink, Harry?" Molly asked.

He realized he was quite thirsty. He lightly nodded his head.

Molly then got out a baby bottle filled with milk. She held it up to Harry's lips. In response, he latched on and began suckling.

It took him two or three minutes to drain the bottle. Every now and then, Molly gently patted him on his bare back, telling him how good a boy he was.

When he was done, Harry let out a soft belch. He blushed and murmured "Excuse me."

Molly just giggled. "That's perfectly normal, sweetie."

Molly then wiped Harry's mouth and removed his bib. She then picked up the plates and the bottle and said "I'll be right back, honey."

She then took the plates, bottle, and bib inside.

Harry was outside on his own on the patio, sitting in a high chair, wearing nothing but his thick cloth diaper. There was nobody else around, and it was very peaceful.

Suddenly, Harry felt a slight ache in his bladder. He instinctively tried to hold it in, but then he remembered what he was wearing. Still, just because he was wearing a diaper, that did not mean he had to use it. Even so...
142231112121.title: Molly feeds Harry

1422311121211.content:
Molly returned a few seconds later and removed the tray from the high chair. As she helped Harry down from it, she noticed his slight discomfort.

"Everything alright, sweetie?" she asked.

"I have to... go," Harry told her, flushing.

Molly smiled and told him gently "You are wearing a nappy, dear." She patted the back of it.

Harry turned to her and muttered "You don't mind if I...?"

"Of course not, honey," Molly asserted, "That's what it's for. Don't worry. I'll change you straight after."

That did make Harry feel a little better. Ultimately, he decided to stop trying to resist.

Gradually, he lessened his hold on his bladder, and allowed himself to let go. There was the soft hissing sound as he began to wet his diaper. A warm, moist feeling began to spread throughout his padded crotch. To Harry's surprise, it was not that unpleasant.

When he was finished soaking his diaper, Molly grinned and said "Good boy. Now, let's get you into a fresh nappy."

Molly took Harry's hand and led him back inside. He waddled all the way back to the living room, wear all his toys were.

"Wait here," Molly instructed him. She left and returned a minute later with the changing supplies.

Molly proceeded to change Harry's diaper. She had him lie down on a towel, and she unpinned the wet padding. After wiping his crotch, she sprinkled in another layer of powder. She slid two more cloth diapers under Harry's bottom, pulled them up between his legs, and pinned them securely in place. She examined the nappies closely, and patted them when she was finished.

"There we go," she muttered in satisfaction. She gathered up the used diaper and stated "I'm going to do some cleaning. You go ahead and continue playing, honey."

Harry just nodded his head.

While Molly went to do some household tasks, Harry went back to his toys. He was really starting to get into the role.

At one point, he wondered... would this be more enjoyable with a playmate?
1422311121211.title: Harry wets his diaper

14223111212112.content:
Twenty minutes after Harry's first diaper change, he heard the front door open. His heart stood still and he held his breath. He was not expecting anyone to come by today. He wondered who it could have been.

He found out a moment later, he heard a feminine voice called out "I'm home! Mum, Harry, are you here?"

It was the voice of Ginny Weasley, Ron's younger sister and Harry's crush. Somehow, knowing that just made him even more anxious. By the sound of her footsteps, she was on her way to the living room.

"Over here, Ginny," Molly called out from the kitchen. To Harry's relief, Ginny's footsteps began to fade away, meaning she was now headed to the kitchen instead of the living room.

"Hey, Mum," Ginny greeted her mother, "What's that smell? Smells like baby powder."

"I know," Molly remarked, "Listen, Ginny. There's something I need to tell you."

Whatever she said next must have been a whisper, as Harry could not hear her speak. Even so, he could imagine what Molly was telling her daughter.

A minute later, Ginny appeared at the entrance to the living room with her mother. Harry noticed her immediately, but he promptly looked away, his face red with embarrassment.

Ginny seemed stunned, but she did not taunt or ridicule Harry. All she did was snicker a bit.

She walked over to Harry and knelt beside him. Harry felt a soft hand on his back, and she said "It's alright, Harry. Mum told me about your 'second childhood.' I'm not going to make fun of you or anything like that. Surely you know me better than that."

Harry was surprised and relieved at the same time. He gradually turned to face his crush. She was smiled sweetly at him and said "Truthfully... you look adorable, Harry."

Harry blushed again. He fully realized that while Ginny was fully clothed in jeans, a shirt, and a light jacket, he was still only wearing his diapers. Their difference in clothing really unsettled him.

Ginny did not seem the least bit bothered, though. In fact, she hugged him. He happily returned the gesture.

"You look like you're having fun," she observed

He finally regained his voice and told her "Well, I... I am."

"Perhaps I could join you," Ginny suggested.

"Join him how?" Molly inquired.

Harry wanted to know that answer himself.
14223111212112.title: Somebody comes around

142231112121122.content:
"I'm no stranger to this," Ginny revealed, "Growing up the youngest of seven, I was always viewed as the baby of the family."

"In a way, you'll always be my baby, darling," Molly proclaimed.

"Yes, Mum," Ginny murmured, flushing. She then told Harry "There are some good things about being the youngest. Having the fewest responsibilities and cares, and being looked after the most. Of course, Mum never tried to put me back into nappies."

Before Harry could blush again, Ginny looked down at his padded loins and remarked "However... those do look pretty comfortable."

"They are," Harry affirmed, shamelessly.

"Maybe you'd like to give them a try, sweetie?" Molly proposed to her daughter.

Harry expected Ginny to be alarmed by that suggestion. Instead, she actually seemed to be seriously considering it.

After about a minute, she shrugged and said "Okay, Mum. Then Harry and I can be playmates."

"I would really like that," Harry muttered confidently. She giggled at his enthusiasm.

Molly seemed to approve very much. She stated "Alright then, honey. Come on upstairs with me. I'll get you into some nappies."

Ginny nodded her head and walked back over to her mother. The two of them disappeared from Harry's field of vision, but he could hear the floorboards creaking as they walked upstairs.

There was silence for a little while. Harry was so excited he could hardly focus on playing or anything else.

About five minutes later, Molly and Ginny returned. Harry looked at his crush and saw that she was clad in...
142231112121122.title: Ginny becomes Harry's playmate.

choices: Harry and Ginny just play with their toys
Harry and Ginny play... then do something else
1422311121211222.content:
Harry's eyes widened in astonishment. Ginny Weasley - his best friend's sister, one of his closest mates, and his crush - came into the living room wearing the exact same attire as Harry. In other words, she had nothing on but a pair of cloth diapers.

Despite how shocked Harry had been at first, he found he liked what he saw. He already viewed Ginny as one of the most beautiful girls he knew, and in her current getup... she looked gorgeous.

Ginny must have noticed Harry was staring at her, as her cheeks turned slightly pink and she gazed awkwardly off to the side. Her long red hair hung partly over her shoulders, but it was not nearly long enough to cover her chest.

Be that as it may, Ginny was making no attempt to cover up her breasts. She did not seem ashamed to have them displayed. That was rather bold of her.

Molly smiled, patted her daughter's diapered bottom, and beckoned her "Go on and sit with Harry, sweetie."

Ginny nodded her head and waddled over to Harry. He scooted a bit to make room for her on the ground. She sat beside him. Once she did that, her embarrassment seemed to vanish.

"I have to say, I'm impressed," Harry thought aloud, "Most girls would be reluctant to be so... exposed in front of a non-family member."

"That's true, and I wouldn't be this casual with just anyone," Ginny professed, "You are an exception, though."

Harry was pleased by that.

Molly added in "That aside, you are like family to us, Harry. Someday, you will be family."

Harry did not know how to react to that. Ginny groaned and mumbled "Mum..."

Molly chuckled and said "You know what I mean, sweetie."

After a few seconds, she added in "I'll be back to work. You two enjoy yourselves."

Molly then departed from the room once more, leaving her daughter and her daughter's crush together, both clad in nothing but thick soft cloth diapers.

14223111212112222.content:
For a while, Harry and Ginny just played with the toys. They rarely spoke in that time.

Finally, after about ten minutes of relative silence, Ginny turned to Harry and said "Harry, could we talk?"

"Of course," he replied.

Ginny folded her hands together and stared in front of her for a bit. Then she looked Harry in the eye and stated "You and I have been through a lot together, right?"

"Correct," he confirmed. They had faced the Chamber of Secrets, the infiltration of the Ministry of Magic, and both of the Death Eaters' attacks on Hogwarts together.

"In addition to that, we've gotten... really close since we first met," the diapered girl supposed.

"Also correct," the diapered boy declared. Harry had fallen deeply in love with Ginny overtime, and she had come to develop similar feelings for him. He found never forget the moment in his sixth year when he kissed her.

"Well... I was wondering," Ginny tentatively began. She stayed quiet for a moment, and then she murmured "Would you... would you... like to... be my...?"

"Boyfriend?" he finished for her.

Ginny flushed again, but she lightly nodded her head.

Harry smiled at her and responded with "I would love to. If you'd like to be my girlfriend, that is."

Ginny smiled back and said "Of course I would."

Harry continued to grin as he leaned forward, cupped Ginny's cheek with his hand, and kissed her gently on the lips. She closed her eyes and returned the affection.

Molly entered the room just in time to see the kiss. But she said and did nothing. She just stood there and grinned. Her daughter and Harry Potters, both in nothing but diapers, kissing each other on the lips... it was a sight she never thought she would see (at least with the nappies involved), but it was a sight she cherished anyway.

Once Harry and Ginny finally pulled apart, Molly proposed...

"Nice to see you two are enjoying yourselves," Molly commented slyly.

Harry and Ginny turned to the latter's mother and blushed. Seeing this, Molly chuckled and said as she walked closer to them "No need to be embarrassed. It's sweet that you two are so close. You are adorable together. And not just because of the nappies."

"Thank you, Mum," Ginny said appreciatively, still somewhat embarrassed.

"Mummy, sweetie," Molly reminded her daughter.

"Mummy," Ginny corrected herself.

Molly smiled and held her hands out to the two diapered teenagers. They each took one of her hands, and she pulled them to their feet. She announced "Come on; let's put you both down for a nap."

Harry and Ginny were by no means tired, but since they were going along with this babying routine, they agreed it could not hurt to take a short nap.

Molly held their hands as she led them upstairs. They waddled alongside her, sneaking a casual glimpse and grin at each other every few seconds.

Soon enough, the three of them were back up in the attic. Molly used her wand to enlarge the crib so that it was big enough to accommodate two young adults.

"Now," she declared, "It's a little drafty up here, so perhaps you two would like to wear something over your nappies? Or, if you'd prefer to wear just your nappies, I could get you some extra blankets to keep you warm. Your choice."

What do Harry and Ginny do?

1422311121211222211.content:
Harry and Ginny stood thinking for about a minute. As curious as they were about baby clothes and although they wanted to wear them at some point, they both felt it would have been more fun to sleep in a crib in just their diapers, first.

Especially since they'd be together. Harry thought there was something inexplicably appealing about seeking Ginny in nothing but her cute padding. Likewise, she appears to have similar thoughts about him.

Thus, Harry turned to Molly and said "I... I guess we'll just sleep like this for now."

"Yeah, we'll be fine in just our nappies," Ginny agreed.

Molly smiled and nodded at their decision. "That is perfectly alright with me, darlings. But first..."

At that, she took out her wand, pointed it at Harry's diapers, and muttered a soft incantation. Then she pointed it at Ginny's diapers and did the same.

"Try taking them off now," she beckoned them.

As odd as that suggestion sounded, Harry and Ginny decided to indulge the latter's mother. They discovered that their diapers were somehow locked in place. They were still comfortable and still fit comfortably, but the pins could not be undone or ripped off, and the material could not be slid down or torn.

"What did you do... Mummy?" Harry asked, a little worried.

"Just a little insurance," Molly revealed proudly, "Only I can change your nappies now. While this spell is active, you cannot remove your own nappies or each other's nappies."

"Why did you do that, Mummy?" Ginny asked, also a little nervous.

"To ensure that you two won't get up to TOO much mischief in bed," Molly replied, in a somewhat devious tone.

"Mum..." Ginny groaned, blushing furiously. Her mother gave her a somewhat displeased look, and then the red-haired girl rolled her eyes and corrected herself with "Mummy."

Harry was blushing, too. He could understand Mrs. Weasley's concern over the two of them sleeping together, but he wished she could have been a little more subtle than THAT.

"I'm not trying to embarrass you," Molly assured them, "You'll thank me for this in time. Believe me, I want grandchildren someday. But before you two decide to have babies of your own, enjoy your own time as babies."

"Okay, Mummy," said Harry. Ginny just nodded.

Molly Weasley then helped her daughter and her daughter's boyfriend into the large crib. Not only was it big enough to hold two of them; there may have even been room for a third person. That was intriguing.

Molly covered Harry and Ginny with some soft blankets. After that, she brought up the rail of the crib and locked it in place. There was a roof on this particular crib, meaning Harry and Ginny were trapped inside. Of course, they could Apparate out, but they were pretending to be babies, and babies did not know how to Apparate.

After the two teens were settled down, Molly turned out the lights to the nursery and headed to the door. Just before she stepped out, she turned back and said "I'll be back in a couple hours. Sweet dreams, you two!"

After that, she left.

Harry and Ginny were all alone, stuck in a crib, cuddled up with one another, wearing nothing but thick white cloth diapers, which they could not take off by themselves.

Did they get some rest, or get "friendly" with each other?
